kpi_info.title: Minutes of Use (MoU)
kpi_info.use: Amount of call minutes within an hour period
kpi_info.formula:
60 * sum( CGRCGROUP_ERLANGS_IN_x_100 + CGRCGROUP_ERLANGS_OUT_x_100 )
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100
Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_CGR_{obj_agg}_{time_agg} or RNS_PS_CGRC_CDS_{time_agg}
